ratings.en: Nani ka o Tanoshimi ni Shite Matsu to iu Koto ga, Sono Ureshî Koto no Hanbun Niataru no yo
Kon'na Omoshiroi Sekai de, Itsu Made mo Kanashinjai Rarenai Wa
Mono Goto no Akarui Hô o Kangaemashô
Akage Kurai, Iyana Mono wa Nai to Omotteitano
Shippai Bakari Shite Kitake do, Hitotsu Suru Tabi ni Jibun no Warui Bubun ga Naotteiku no
Atashi wa, Jibun no Hoka, Dare ni mo Naritakunai wa
Next to Trying and Winning, the Best Thing Is Trying and Failing
I Don't Know What Lies Around the Bend, but I'm Going to Believe That the Best Does
I'd Like to Add Some Beauty to Life
Perhaps We Always Love Best the People Who Need Us
When I Think Something Nice Is Going to Happen, I Seem to Fly Right up on the Wings of Anticipation
It Is Never Too Late for the Real Prince to Come for the True Princess
Sekai no Hate ni Ite mo, Tondeikuwa
